Info.Title: Effie Gray
Info.Actors: Dakota Fanning, Polly Dartford, Greg Wise, Tom Sturridge
Info.Plot: A look at the scandalous love triangle between Victorian art critic John Ruskin (Greg Wise), his teenage bride Euphemia "Effie" Gray (Dakota Fanning), and Pre-Raphaelite painter John Everett Millais (Tom Sturridge).
